issue.title: Enable Bloom filter on big endian architectures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16591](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16591). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are some problems with byte ordering in the Bloom filter's bit vector on Big endian machines. This needs to be debugged and enabled on Big endian.
